task.title: How to Clean Up the Classroom after Use
task.shortdesc: These instructions will teach you how to clean up after rental use of AirClassroom, as well as the procedure after use.

step.cmd: Gather up the things provided for you in the room, including the broom, dust pan, laser pointer, chalk piece, projector, HDMI cable, trash bags, and chalkboard cleaner
Clean the white board with the chalkboard cleaner if you used it
Put the chalk piece, laser pointer, and chalkboard cleaner on the chalkboard stand
Turn off the projector by push the power button on its right side
Sweep around with the broom and dust pan for any small trash (bottles, wrappers, etc.)
step.info: Any large spills and objects (mini bar, juice bar, catering) will be cleaned by our janitoral staff

step.cmd: Throw the trash you gathered into one of the three trash bags provided
Put the broom, dust pan, and HDMI cable in the corner closet after use
Leave the classroom with all you possessions, the door will lock automatically
Go to the front desk and give the receptionist your guest ID
